title: Real Estate Website
description: ## Overview Built with the **MERN** stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) and MUI for a modern, responsive UI. A real estate platform featuring property search, filtering, and detailed listings with agent contact integration. ### Highlights - Advanced property search with filters (location, price, beds, amenities) - High-quality image galleries and responsive layouts - SEO-ready metadata and clean URLs ### Tech Notes - MERN + MUI for component-driven UI - Image carousel with thumbnail preview - Optimized assets and lazy loading > Users can browse, filter, and contact agents effortlessly.
summary: MERN real estate platform with filters and agent contact.

title: Financial Website
description: ## Overview Built with the **MERN** stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js). A modern financial services site with product pages, calculators, and secure contact flows. ### Features - Product catalog for loans, savings, and investments - Interactive loan calculators with charts - Accessibility and performance focused ### Business Model - Includes network-based referral logic (downlines / team hierarchies) for incentives ### Security - Sanitized inputs and secure contact endpoints For more info, see the project documentation.
summary: Financial site with product pages, calculators, and secure contact.

title: E Commerce Website
description: ## Overview Storefront built using **Shopify Liquid** for theming and presentation, with an **Express + MongoDB + Node.js** backend powering integrations, data, and custom endpoints. ### Capabilities - Sort, filter, and search across thousands of products - Persistent cart with discounts and shipping estimates - Streamlined checkout with multiple payment methods ### Performance - Code-splitting, image optimization, and caching Outcome: Faster browsing and higher conversion rates.
summary: Shopify storefront with fast search, cart, and streamlined checkout.
